Definitely! But if you’re offering to help, there is something you could do.
See, I’m trying to explore more of the sea floor, but I can’t dive deep enough. If you could help me gather materials on this planet, I could build a [object=submersible].
Thanks for the help! We can now build the [object=submersible] at the [color=770000]Sub Pen[/color]!
The [object=submersible] is finished! We can use it to explore the deepest trenches. I have a feeling we’ll find more [color=770000]Monoliths[/color] there.
Have you seen the ruins and [color=770000]Monolith[/color] on this island? I wonder what they are? And how to activate them?
Aaah, it is so beautiful. I could stay here forever.
I wonder who built the [color=770000]Monoliths[/color]? And what we need to activate them. The answer must be somewhere underwater!
I’ve figured it out - we need [item=bone_shard]s to activate the [color=770000]Monoliths[/color]! We must activate them all - nothing is more important!
We must activate all the [color=770000]Monoliths[/color]! There are {count} remaining that need to be activated!
I can craft [item=power_core]s from [item=power_core_parts] for the [object=submersible]!
I must thank you. I was stuck here a long, long time, and this puppet was insufficient for my needs. I could never have come this far without you.
Stuck here? Puppet? What are you talking about? Who - are you?
Forgive me, I haven’t introduced myself.
They called me the Dishonored One.
They thought they knew everything. But in the end, who prevailed? I have survived, and thus, I have won!
I hope they enjoy their lofty ideals as they rot in their graves. Prepare to join them!
You thought you could escape that easily?!
Everything is perfectly fine. Accept your fate and let us destroy you.
Don’t attack - I’m not your enemy!
I’m the sister of the Dishonored One. He kept me alive because of our shared blood, but there was no love between us. I was a Teacher… and he - he destroyed us all.
Maybe if we had dealt with him differently, none of this would have happened… but at least he is defeated now and the threat is over.
Here, take this [item=dragon_armor2] as my thanks. Hopefully you will use our magic better than they did. Perhaps my brother wasn’t entirely crazy when he refused to share our teachings.
The stasis spell my brother used to keep us alive was complex, but it is not impossible that others were able to cast it as well. Perhaps I’m not the last of my kind after all.
Thank you for all your help. I am off to search for any survivors - even if it takes my whole life, I would rather believe others still live than stay here in despair.
Huh? What was I doing here…? I remember coming here and that there was something important I had to do here. But it’s all so fuzzy.
After being possessed by an insane alien, you can't expect me to go out there and get mutated by an insane robot.
How about leaving this planet behind? You’re welcome to join me in the [color=770000]Mobile Research Lab[/color]!
Yeah… perhaps that’s for the best. Maybe I can get my life back in order and even help you with your research!
It’s hard to believe that humanity was almost wiped out - the last year still feels like a dream to me. But, I’ll do everything I can to help!
No profession was more honored than the Teachers. The Teachers used their skills to travel the universe in an instant, spreading their knowledge to the distant stars.
It was the way of the Teachers to share their discoveries to the benefit of all. But, one Teacher refused, instead hoarding all of their secrets and looking down on the rest.
Ever tolerant, it took a long time for the other Teachers to act. But eventually, they cast him out of their ranks and named him the Dishonored One.
The Dishonored One sneered at the other Teachers, calling them fools and assuring them that he would have the last laugh. After this, he disappeared. Only his sister knew where he had hidden himself.
With many years of peace, none expected the flood. The waters rose and rose, flooding villages and killing many. Even the teachers couldn't handle the unrelenting waters.
When the Dishonored One announced that he had conjured the flood, he did not seem the least bit remorseful, even as the death toll rose and rose.
The Teachers knew they had to stop the Dishonored One. They banded together and fought him at the summit of the tallest mountain, where the waters had not yet reached.
The battle raged for weeks, and drained even this planet’s vast amount of magic. With the supply of magic running thin, survival became a challenge.
The Dishonored One survived by going into a deep slumber, and the Teachers deactivated the Mana Conveyors so that even when magic returned to this world, the Dishonored One would be unable to awaken.
This is the final warning of those who lived on this planet: do not awaken the Dishonored One. Let him rest for all eternity.
다른 플레이어가 볼 수 있는 이름을 입력하세요. 이 이름은 당신의 캐릭터와 연결되며, 만약 당신이 이름을 바꾼다면 다른 새로운 캐릭터가 만들어집니다.

Available commands:[color=ffffff] {list}.\n[color=aaaaaa]Type /help command for more details about a command.
/help [[command] - [color=aaaaaa]shows a list of commands, or details about a single command.
/whisper player message - [color=aaaaaa]sends message only to player. Player can be their name, or $player[[num].
/give player - [color=aaaaaa]opens a transfer item window for that player. Only hosts can take items, but this works even for offline players.
/unequip player - [color=aaaaaa]unequips all items from the player and places it in their inventory so you can take them using /give. Host only.
/delete player - [color=aaaaaa]permanently deletes player and all of their items. They can rejoin, but will restart as a new character. Host only.
/leave - [color=aaaaaa]removes your player without disconnecting and allowing you to continue hosting the game and chatting.
/to player - [color=aaaaaa]instantly teleports to the chosen player.
/list - [color=aaaaaa]lists all players who have ever been on this server, along with their $player[[num] values.
/server [[start|stop|private|public] - [color=aaaaaa]starts, stops or sets whether to show the server in the games list. Host only.
/kick player - [color=aaaaaa]kicks the player from the game. It will ask you if they want to join again. Host only.
/ban player - [color=aaaaaa]bans the player by name and IP address. You will not be asked if they want to join again. Host only.
/unban player - [color=aaaaaa]unbans a previously banned player. Host only.
/pre [[text] - [color=aaaaaa]prepends text to all messages. If text not set, removes prefix. Can be used to change text color by prepending [[color=value].
/post [[text] - [color=aaaaaa]appends text to all messages. If text not set, removes postfix.
/rename player - [color=aaaaaa]changes a player's name. This will kick them if they are logged in. Host only.
